title: The Lansdowne
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Beer/Wine, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pub offering cocktails as well non-alcoholic drinks, and food including several marked veg/vegan choices, e.g. polenta fries, wild mushroom raviolo, sweet potato and coconut korma. Vegan alcohol such as Westons cider. Food service stops at 9pm Mon-Sat and 7pm Sun.
